EmailTemplate.name: Z Assistant : Deadline Approaching
EmailTemplate.subject: Deadline Approaching: {!Contact.FirstName}'s - Candidate Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Opportunity.Asst_Name__c},
I wanted to follow up with a friendly reminder letting you know, that we have not received {!Contact.FirstName}'s completed candidate evaluation form for the {!Market__c.Publication_Year__c}<.{!Market__c.Program_Name__c} Award, as of today. I understand that you both have very busy schedule and want to remind you that the deadline is quickly approaching.
You can access {!Contact.FirstName}'s secure, online link below to complete your candidate form. The form takes just a few minutes to complete and if you do have any questions feel free to contact me at any time.
2015 Award Candidate Evaluation Form - Click Here to Complete Deadline to submit is end of day, {!Market__c.ACDF_Deadline__c}.
This only takes a few minutes of your time to complete. Award winners are scheduled to be notified 4-6 weeks after the deadline date.
If you have any questions or if you would like to complete the information over the phone, please contact me at {!User.Phone}.
Thank you,
{!User.Name} Research Assistant
Five Star Professional 2900 Lone Oak Parkway Suite 120 Eagan, MN 55121 Direct: {!User.Phone} Main: 1-888-438-5782 Fax: 651-259-1940 {!User.Email} http://www.fivestarprofessional.com
We exist to define and promote professional excellence.
Reminder: Third party firms may have contacted you suggesting you are an award winner and offering you wall plaques or other products. These firms are in no way affiliated with Five Star Professional.
Only Five Star Professional can name you a Five Star award winner and provide official award-related products and services. Marketing organizations not affiliated with Five Star Professional do not comply with industry regulatory requirements and may be violating trademarks or copyrights.
